ProjectTitle: Representational changes underlying human learning: A computational cognitive neuroscience perspective
InitialFeedbackHistory: 02/06/2022 [REDACTED] 4.1: [REDACTED] information provided in this section is rather generic. [REDACTED] goal of a DMP is to act as a guide/checklist for researchers hired on the project so that they know how to handle the research data. [REDACTED] goal can only be reached if a bit more information is provided on the data and documentation. [REDACTED] this section contains a list of all necessary documentation files, the researchers can use this DMP at the end of the project as a checklist to make sure that the documentation is complete. Please note also that information in this section often goes beyond information provided in a method section. [REDACTED] might save storage space but should only be done if the data can be reproduced safely and the data generation itself does not use too much resources. [REDACTED] section 7 I would also advise to use RDR, the KU [REDACTED] research data repository, as an alternative to OSF. [REDACTED] biggest advantage of RDR for researchers at PPW is the DOI and the higher findability of the data and research materials thanks to better metadata.
